channel.title: CNN.com - RSS Channel - World
channel.description: CNN.com delivers up-to-the-minute news and information on the latest top stories, weather, entertainment, politics and more.

item.title: Missing Argentine sub: New timeline released
item.description: The Argentine military Tuesday released its most detailed timeline yet in this month's disappearance of a naval submarine, saying that the vessel first reported a battery short-circuit roughly 10 hours before an explosion-like sound was detected near the sub's last known location.

item.title: Navy not giving up search for sub after 'explosion' report
item.description: The Argentine navy says it's not ready to give up a search for a vanished submarine, after the military revealed a sound consistent with an explosion was detected near the vessel's last known location last week off the country's South Atlantic coast.

item.title: Critical moments in missing submarine search
item.description: A noise detected near the last known location of a missing Argentine submarine on the day it vanished was consistent with an explosion, the Argentine Navy said.

item.title: Missing sub could be out of oxygen soon
item.description: Worried relatives of 44 missing Argentine submariners were comforted Tuesday by banners and the support of countrymen who gathered outside a naval base here. For now, all they can do is wait, hope and pray the crew will be rescued.

item.title: Missing sub: What we know
item.description: Efforts to locate an Argentine submarine that has been missing since last week have been ramped up dramatically by a multinational search team of boats and planes, the country's navy says.

item.title: Bitcoin just hit $10,000, shows no sign of slowing
item.description: The great bitcoin boom of 2017 is going from strength to strength.

item.title: Electric planes by 2020?

item.description: Their missions vary greatly: To provide loving homes for orphaned children, feed those in crisis or mend war's psychological wounds.

item.title: Vote for your favorite!
Best of 2017: 10 tales of caring
item.description: Meet 10 everyday people doing extraordinary things to change the world. Cast your vote for CNN Hero of the Year at CNNHeroes.com and watch CNN Heroes: An All-Star Tribute, Sunday, Dec. 17 at 8pm ET

item.description: In a special episode of CNNTalk, host Max Foster spoke to Nima Elbagir and her team about their investigation into migrants being auctioned as slaves in Libya
Former Director of National Intelligence James Clapper reacts to Donald Trump retweeting three inflammatory videos of anti-Muslim content.
Minutes after North Korea's new ICBM launch, South Korea fired multiple missiles in a "precision missile strike drill."
In 2010, CNN's David McKenzie traveled to Rutundu, Kenya, for a closer look at where Prince William proposed to Kate Middleton, now the Duchess of Cambridge.
CNN's Don Lemon talks to retired Col. Cedric Leighton on the possibility of the United States going to war with North Korea.

Authorities have issued the highest-level warning possible after volcanic eruptions from Mount Agung on the Indonesian resort island of Bali forced the closure of the island's main airport and evacuation of thousands of residents living nearby.
Meghan Markle has been advocating for women's rights and making her mark in the philanthropy world long before her prince came along. CNN's Isa Soares reports.
The British Royal Family has revealed when and where Prince Harry's wedding with actress Meghan Markle will take place. CNN's Royal Correspondent Max Foster reports.

item.title: Detained Americans Fast Facts
item.description: Read CNN's Fast Facts about recent cases of foreign governments detaining US citizens.
Following his electoral win boycotted by the opposition, Uhuru Kenyatta is sworn in for a second term as president of Kenya amid violent protests. CNN's Farai Sevenzo reports.
Four ships, some with dead bodies aboard, have washed ashore this month in Japan.
